article.title: Send In Your Ideas for Open Government
article.author: Katie Packard
article.abstract: President Obama's Open Government Initiative is underway, and the government wants to hear from you. What are your ideas on open government? Help the government draft open government plans by sharing your thoughts on how each agency can be more open and transparent.
article.text:
President Obama's Open Government Initiative is underway, and the government wants to hear from you. What are your ideas on open government? Help the government draft open government plans by sharing your thoughts on how each agency can be more open and transparent.
The excellent Armed With Science blog has a great post that provides step-by-step instructions on how to submit your ideas. Be sure to check it out and then head over to the Defense Department's Open Gov page to get started. The Defense Department's plan will be published in April, so submit your suggestions by March 17.
